message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $95. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Hi Alice, $95 is a bit high for me.  I'm willing to pay $85 for the product.  Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't go lower than $90. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it brings.
Alice, I understand you need to make a profit, but $90 is still a bit steep for me. I'm happy to pay $88. This is my final offer before I go with John.
